item.description:
Green Drinks this Wednesday @ Anchor

Calling all old people! Do you like David Hasselhoff, Bette Midler,
Julio Iglesias and Barbara Streisand? Then you're a little bit old
and this month's Green Drinks is in honor of YOU!

The Green Drinks committee heard that old people think Green Drinks is
just for us kids. Well poop damn! Just because you're getting gray
doesn't mean you can't be green too!

Join us Pirates this Wednesday, July 16th and get some serious booty
from 6:00-8:00pm at Anchor Bar, 272 College Street, New Haven, CT,
(203) 865-1512.

This month Sunlight Solar, a leading photovoltaic design and
installation contractor, will be explaining the process of solar
installation in Connecticut. And avast! Anchor has gotten us some of
the best deals we've seen yet on grog – a dollar off everything – well
cocktails $3 and all beers between $2-4! But that's not all! IF
YOU'RE OLD YOU GET IN FOR FREE! (and so does everyone else but old
people don't read lowercase.) Anyone who brings a walker or wears an
eye-patch the whole night gets a free drink on me!

Remember to walk, bike, wheelchair, hobble or carpool to the event.
And bring your AARP card just for fun!

See you there ... unless it's past your bedtime...

- New Haven Green Drinks
newhavengreendrinks @gmail.com
item.name: Green Drinks goes Solar
